fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Partecipation to EU Consultation on Space Work Programme, Space Policy and other related consultations through the Italian Space Agency and at European level through SME4SPACE (www.sme4space.org)
organisation_name: Associazione delle Imprese per le Attività Spaziali (AIPAS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: AIPAS is founder member and Operative Secretariat of SME4SPACE (www.sme4space.org), the European panel of Space SME Associations.
